com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.services

Class JpaClusterServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.services.JpaClusterServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterService

    @Transactional(rollbackFor={GenieException.class,javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class})
public class JpaClusterServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterService
    Implementation of the ClusterService interface using JPA.

        getClusters in interface ClusterService
        Parameters:
        name - cluster name
        statuses - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        tags - tags allocated to this cluster
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster configuration was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster configuration was updated
        page - The page to get
